title: Tamil Nadu Weather Today, November 21: Tamil Nadu to receive light to moderate rain; heavy rain in isolated pockets
text:
The rain in Tamil Nadu is refusing to abate, with the India Meteorological Department (IMD) forecasting more showers in store. Light to moderate rain may occur at a few places in Tamil Nadu, Puducherry and Karaikal on Friday (November 21), according to the IMD. One or two places may see thunderstorm and lightning.

Weather authorities say Tenkasi, Virudhunagar, Tirunelveli, Kanyakumari, Thoothukudi, Ramanathapuram, Cuddalore, Tiruvarur, Nagapattinam and Mayiladuthurai districts and Karaikal may record heavy rain at isolated spots. These districts may continue to record heavy rain over the next few days, according to IMD.
